title: Disconnect issues. Don't know if its riot or ISP
body:
Me and my friend were playing league. For some reason we are getting multiple disconnect from league in game while our internet is working perfectly fine on discord. 

We are playing at our own homes. 

Both from Edmonton, Alberta Canada. I don't know if anyone has been experiencing any disconnect issue.

ISP is SHAW.

replies.body: Yes i have the same problem. it disconnects and it takes around a minute to reconnect back. i live in Calgary Alberta. and i use shaw as well!
Hey! I legit just had the same issue last game. Kept randomly disconnecting. Never had this problem before. From Alberta and I have shaw too. I guess it might be a problem with them maybe?
Hey man are you still dcing? Cause im getting the same problems too it might be shaw.

Are you guys also on the same network, or different locations with the same ISP?  If you guys are routing the same way, there could be a hiccup with how you're reaching us.  You can download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a traceroute to 104.160.131.1 and see if your ISP is struggling to get to us.

Otherwise, these issues are commonly caused by more local network instabilities, and can be fixed up by going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  I hope that helps!
Different locations with the same ISP.
Myself as well, Alberta, with shaw.
Same problem, same ISP.  Is there a routing issue, or anything we can do to resolve this?
